title: Compression Level
desc: Trade-off between compression speed and compression ratio. Default: 18, Max: 22

title: Use Blockcompression
desc: Uses highly multithreaded block compression with random read access allowing compressed games to be played without decompression in the future however this comes with a low compression ratio cost

title: Block Size
desc: Block Size for random read access 2^x while x between 14 and 32. Default: 20 => 1 MB

title: Verify
desc: Verifies files after compression raising an unhandled exception on hash mismatch and verify existing NSP and NSZ files when given as parameter
